card-1.title: Data control
card-1.desc: You can host AppFlowy wherever you want; no vendor lock-in.

card-2.title: Always available
card-2.desc: AppFlow works completely offline, internet or service issues will never be your problem.

card-3.title: You own your data, forever
card-3.desc: Your notes live on your device, period. You can encrypt them or back them up however you want; it's your decision, not ours.

title.prefix:
AppFlowy is built with
a vibrant

desc-1.title: Build by the people for the people
desc-1.desc:
We collaboratively create apps that suit others’ needs by developing a versatile toolbox of plugins, templates, and more.
Join us to build a toolbox that empowers anyone to create their own system - play and tweak without a limit on what's possible.

desc-2.title: Open source
desc-2.desc: AppFlowy is open source, which means anyone can freely access, modify, and contribute to the codebase. We believe that open source is the best way to build software, and we’re committed to sharing our work with the world.
